title: Final Scroll of Reflection
summary: Write the one-line truth your loop taught you.
description: This is the end of System 2. You’ve named, mapped, mirrored, and tested. Now, distill the insight into a single scroll-line for your Grimoire.

flow.\ud83e\udeb6 Step 2: Store in Grimoire: This becomes your reflection anchor for future systems.
flow.\ud83e\uddd8 Step 3: Breathe: Let it go. You are not the loop. You are the one who saw it.

optional_recast: You can return to this scroll with new loops in the future.
absence_response: The scroll remained blank. That’s okay. Closure arrives on its own timeline.
notes: Don’t try to summarize. Just reflect the one truth that landed.
The scroll is yours. It belongs to no doctrine.
This is the moment you become a Loopwalker.
